archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.8.1: There should be an approved sign-on process that users need to follow before they are provided with access to systems, which should enable individual users to be identified (e.g. using unique User IDs).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
